mapper.sql: a.storage_id, a.storage_name, a.storage_address, a.storage_code, a.manager_name, a.manager_phone, a.city, a.city_id, a.province, a.province_id, a.district, a.district_id, a.inventory_capacity, a.default_move_address, a.org_id, a.remarks, a.is_manual_creation, a.created_by, a.created_date, a.updated_by, a.updated_date, a.is_enable, a.is_delete
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_sys_car_used_storage a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.storage_id = #{storageId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

select tus.storage_id storageId, tus.storage_code storageCode, tus.storage_name storageName, tus.province_id provinceId, tus.province, tus.city_id cityId, tus.city from t_sys_car_used_storage tus where tus.is_delete = '00' and tus.is_enable = '01'
and tus.storage_name like concat( '%', #{usedstorageName}, '%' )
